meanings.definition: In a lower place or position.
meanings.sent1: The cat sat belows the table.
meanings.sent2: The treasure chest is hidden belows the old tree.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ran belows the fence and surprised the dog.
meanings.sent4: The stars shine brightly belows the dark sky.
meanings.sent5: The roots of the tree stretch far belows the ground.

meanings.definition: To be situated beneath something else.
meanings.sent1: The book belows the notebook on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The fish always belows the surface of the water.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit loves to belows the bushes and play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The truth always belows the surface, waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The key always belows the welcome mat for safekeeping.

meanings.definition: To make a sound that is lower in pitch.
meanings.sent1: The lion belows loudly in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The thunder belows in the distance before the storm arrives.
meanings.sent3: The old car engine belows when it starts in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The whale belows a haunting song in the deep ocean.
meanings.sent5: The wind belows through the trees, creating a soothing melody.
